short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save URLs and open them all at once

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BulkOpener is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by allowing you to save and open multiple URLs simultaneously with just one click. Whether you're a researcher, a marketer, or simply someone who manages many links, BulkOpener is here to streamline your workflow and save you valuable time.
